animals.name: Aardvark
animals.description: Aardvarks are nocturnal mammals native to Africa, known for their burrowing habits.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: Elephants are large mammals with trunks and tusks, known for their intelligence.

animals.name: Monkey
animals.description: Monkeys are primates known for their agility and playful nature.

animals.name: Seal
animals.description: Seals are marine mammals known for their streamlined bodies and aquatic abilities.

animals.name: Black Leopard
animals.description: Black leopards are big cats with a distinctive dark coat.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: Giraffes are the tallest terrestrial animals with long necks and legs.

animals.name: Monkey (Variant)
animals.description: A variant of the monkey species known for its playful behavior.

animals.name: Snake
animals.description: Snakes are legless reptiles with elongated bodies.

animals.name: Butterfly
animals.description: Butterflies are insects with colorful wings, known for their metamorphosis.

animals.name: Gorilla
animals.description: Gorillas are large primates known for their strength and intelligence.

animals.name: Mouse
animals.description: Mice are small rodents with a pointed snout and long tail.

animals.name: Springbock
animals.description: Springbocks are antelopes known for their leaping behavior.

animals.name: Camel
animals.description: Camels are desert animals with humps for storing fat.

animals.name: Hippopotamus
animals.description: Hippos are large, semi-aquatic mammals known for their aggressive nature.

animals.name: Panda
animals.description: Pandas are bears native to China, known for their black-and-white fur.

animals.name: Squirrel
animals.description: Squirrels are rodents known for their bushy tails and agility.

animals.name: Cat
animals.description: Cats are small domesticated mammals known for their agility.

animals.name: Horse
animals.description: Horses are strong animals often used for riding and transport.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.description: Penguins are flightless birds known for their black-and-white plumage.

animals.name: Tortoise
animals.description: Tortoises are land-dwelling reptiles with a hard shell for protection.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.description: Cheetahs are the fastest land animals, known for their speed and agility.

animals.name: Kangaroo
animals.description: Kangaroos are marsupials native to Australia, known for their hopping movement.

animals.name: Pig
animals.description: Pigs are domesticated animals known for their intelligence and adaptability.

animals.name: Warthog
animals.description: Warthogs are wild pigs with distinctive tusks and rugged features.

animals.name: Koala
animals.description: Koalas are marsupials native to Australia, known for their eucalyptus diet.

animals.name: Polar Bear
animals.description: Polar bears are large carnivorous bears native to the Arctic.

animals.name: Cow
animals.description: Cows are domesticated mammals raised for milk and meat.

animals.name: Lion
animals.description: Lions are big cats known as the king of the jungle.

animals.name: Porcupine
animals.description: Porcupines are rodents with a coat of sharp quills for defense.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.description: Crocodiles are large aquatic reptiles known for their powerful jaws.

animals.name: Lizard
animals.description: Lizards are reptiles with scaly skin, commonly found in various habitats.

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.description: Rabbits are small mammals known for their long ears and quick reproduction.

animals.name: Dog
animals.description: Dogs are domesticated mammals known for their loyalty and companionship.

animals.name: Meerkat
animals.description: Meerkats are small mongoose known for their upright posture.

animals.name: Rhino
animals.description: Rhinoceroses are large mammals with distinctive horns on their snouts.

transport.name: Ambulance
transport.description: An ambulance is a vehicle equipped to transport sick or injured people to medical facilities.

transport.name: Fire Engine
transport.description: A fire engine is a vehicle designed to assist in fighting fires.

transport.name: Rickshaw
transport.description: A rickshaw is a three-wheeled vehicle, often pulled manually or motorized.

transport.name: Helicopter
transport.description: A helicopter is an aircraft with rotating blades that can take off and land vertically.

transport.name: School Bus
transport.description: A school bus is a vehicle used to transport students to and from school.

transport.name: Auto Rickshaw
transport.description: An auto rickshaw is a small three-wheeled motorized vehicle for public transport.

transport.name: Horse
transport.description: Horses have been used historically for transportation and pulling carriages.

transport.name: Scooty
transport.description: A scooty is a lightweight, two-wheeled motorized vehicle.

transport.name: Bus
transport.description: A bus is a large vehicle used for public transport of passengers.

transport.name: Ice Cream Van
transport.description: An ice cream van is a vehicle used to sell ice cream.

transport.name: Ship
transport.description: A ship is a large watercraft used for transporting goods or people.

transport.name: Car Carrying Truck
transport.description: A truck designed for carrying multiple cars.

transport.name: Jeep
transport.description: A jeep is a rugged vehicle often used for off-road travel.

transport.name: Microbus
transport.description: A microbus is a smaller bus designed for transporting fewer passengers.

transport.name: Speed Boat
transport.description: A speed boat is a small fast boat often used for recreation.

transport.name: Car
transport.description: A car is a four-wheeled motor vehicle for personal transport.

transport.name: Motorbike
transport.description: A motorbike is a two-wheeled vehicle powered by an engine.

transport.name: Pickup
transport.description: A pickup truck is a light motor vehicle with an open rear cargo area.

transport.name: Police Car
transport.description: A police car is a vehicle used by law enforcement for patrol and response.

transport.name: Electric Wheelchair
transport.description: An electric wheelchair is a motorized chair for individuals with mobility challenges.

clothing.name: Cap
clothing.description: A cap is a type of headwear with a visor, often worn for casual or sports purposes.

clothing.name: Hoodie
clothing.description: A hoodie is a sweatshirt with a hood, popular for casual wear.

clothing.name: Shirt
clothing.description: A shirt is a garment for the upper body, typically with a collar and buttons.

clothing.name: Sweater
clothing.description: A sweater is a knitted garment for the upper body, often worn in cold weather.

clothing.name: Converse
clothing.description: Converse are popular sneakers often used for casual wear.

clothing.name: Jacket
clothing.description: A jacket is a garment for the upper body, designed for warmth or style.

clothing.name: Shoe
clothing.description: A shoe is a type of footwear worn to protect and comfort the foot.

clothing.name: T-Shirt
clothing.description: A T-shirt is a lightweight, casual garment with short sleeves.

clothing.name: Dress
clothing.description: A dress is a one-piece garment worn by women or girls, covering the upper and lower body.

clothing.name: Jeans
clothing.description: Jeans are a type of pants made from denim, popular for casual wear.

clothing.name: Sock
clothing.description: A sock is a piece of clothing worn on the feet, often under shoes.

clothing.name: Underpants
clothing.description: Underpants are garments worn under clothing to cover the lower body.

food.name: Tacos
food.description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish consisting of a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients like meat, beans, and vegetables.

food.name: Salad
food.description: Salad is a dish consisting of a mixture of various ingredients such as vegetables, fruits, nuts, and dressings, often served cold.

food.name: Noodles
food.description: Noodles are a type of staple food made from unleavened dough, often boiled or stir-fried, and can be served in a variety of dishes.

food.name: Burger
food.description: A hamburger is a sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.

food.name: Pizza
food.description: Pizza is an Italian dish consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients.

food.name: Sushi
food.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice accompanied by various ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and sometimes tropical fruits.

treats.name: Chocolate
treats.description: Chocolate is a sweet, brown food made from roasted and ground cacao seeds.

treats.name: Candy
treats.description: Candy is a sweet treat made with sugar or other sweeteners.

treats.name: Cookies
treats.description: Cookies are small, sweet, baked treats often containing ingredients like chocolate chips, nuts, or dried fruit.

treats.name: Waffle
treats.description: Waffle is a light, crisp, batter-based cake cooked between two patterned plates.

treats.name: Cake
treats.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert, usually made with flour, sugar, eggs, and butter.

treats.name: Ice Cream
treats.description: Ice cream is a frozen dessert made from dairy products and often flavored with fruits or other ingredients.

vegetables.name: Asparagus
vegetables.description: Asparagus is a spring vegetable known for its slender spears.

vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.description: The carrot is a root vegetable often claimed to be the perfect health food.

vegetables.name: Brussels Sprouts
vegetables.description: Brussels sprouts are small, leafy green buds that resemble miniature cabbages.

vegetables.name: Butternut Squash
vegetables.description: Butternut squash is a type of winter squash with a sweet, nutty taste.

vegetables.name: Cabbage
vegetables.description: Cabbage is a leafy green, red, or white biennial plant grown as an annual vegetable crop.

vegetables.name: Kohlrabi
vegetables.description: Kohlrabi is a biennial vegetable, a low, stout cultivar of wild cabbage.

vegetables.name: Chickpeas
vegetables.description: Chickpeas are a type of legume, also known as garbanzo beans.

vegetables.name: Eggplants
vegetables.description: Eggplants, also known as aubergines, are a species of nightshade grown for their edible fruit.

vegetables.name: Garlic
vegetables.description: Garlic is a species in the onion genus, Allium.

vegetables.name: Green Beans
vegetables.description: Green beans are the unripe, young fruit of various cultivars of the common bean.

vegetables.name: Legumes
vegetables.description: Legumes are a class of vegetables that include beans, peas, and lentils.

vegetables.name: Onion
vegetables.description: Onions are a type of vegetable known for their pungent flavor and aroma.

vegetables.name: Peas
vegetables.description: Peas are small, spherical seeds or the seed-pod of the pod fruit Pisum sativum.

vegetables.name: Potato
vegetables.description: The potato is a starchy tuber of the plant Solanum tuberosum.

vegetables.name: Pumpkin
vegetables.description: A pumpkin is a cultivar of winter squash that is round with smooth, slightly ribbed skin.

vegetables.name: Red Chili
vegetables.description: Red chili peppers are the ripe, dried pods of the chili pepper plant.

vegetables.name: Rice
vegetables.description: Rice is the seed of the grass species Oryza sativa or Oryza glaberrima.

fruits.name: Apple

fruits.description: A banana is an elongated, edible fruit produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants.

fruits.name: Strawberry

fruits.name: Coconut

fruits.name: Granadilla

fruits.name: Grapefruit

fruits.name: Green Pear

fruits.description: A pineapple is a tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, yellow flesh inside.

activities.name: Cycling
activities.description: Cycling is an outdoor activity that strengthens the body and helps explore nature.

activities.name: Painting
activities.description: Painting is a fun activity that allows you to express creativity through colors and strokes.

activities.name: Skating

activities.description: A teeter totter is a playground activity where children balance and rock back and forth.

activities.name: Skateboarding

activities.name: Swing

activities.name: Trampoline

nature.name: Arctic
nature.description: The Arctic is a cold, icy region at the northernmost part of Earth, home to polar bears and stunning ice landscapes.

nature.name: Mountain
nature.description: Mountains are large landforms that rise prominently above the surrounding land, offering breathtaking views and challenging hikes.

nature.name: Desert
nature.description: A desert is a barren area of landscape with little rainfall, known for its dunes, cacti, and extreme temperatures.

nature.name: Ocean
nature.description: The ocean is a vast body of salt water that covers the majority of Earth's surface, teeming with marine life.

nature.name: Jungle
nature.description: A jungle is a dense, tropical forest rich in biodiversity, filled with exotic plants and animals.

nature.name: Volcano
nature.description: A volcano is a mountain that erupts with molten rock, ash, and gases from Earth's mantle.

treats-and-food.name: Biscuits

treats-and-food.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert often made with flour, sugar, eggs, and butter.

treats-and-food.name: Candy
treats-and-food.description: Candy is a sweet confection made with sugar, often colorful and fun to eat.

treats-and-food.name: Pizza
treats-and-food.description: Pizza is a savory dish made of a flat, round dough base topped with cheese, sauce, and other ingredients.

treats-and-food.name: Ice Cream

treats-and-food.name: Chocolate
treats-and-food.description: Chocolate is a sweet treat made from roasted and ground cacao beans.

treats-and-food.name: Donuts
treats-and-food.description: Donuts are fried dough confections, often sweet and round with a hole in the center.

treats-and-food.name: French Fries

nuts.name: Almonds

nuts.name: Cashews
nuts.description: Cashews are creamy and rich nuts that are a great source of energy and nutrients.

nuts.name: Peanuts

nuts.name: Pistachios
